parameters.name: AddressType
parameters.description:
The type of the IPv6 address. Valid values:

*   IPv6Address (default): an IPv6 address.
*   IPv6Prefix: an IPv6 CIDR block.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically uses the **request ID** as the **client token**. The **request ID** may be different for each request.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run, without performing the actual request. Valid values:

*   true: performs only a dry run. The system checks the request for potential issues, including missing parameter values, incorrect request syntax, and service limits. If the request fails the dry run, an error message is returned. If the request passes the dry run, the DryRunOperation error code is returned.
*   false (default): performs a dry run and performs the actual request. If the request passes the dry run, a 2xx HTTP status code is returned and the operation is performed.

parameters.name: Ipv6Address
parameters.description: The IPv6 address. The IPv6 address must be an idle one that falls within the vSwitch CIDR block.

parameters.name: Ipv6AddressDescription
parameters.description: The description of the IPv6 address.

parameters.name: Ipv6AddressName
parameters.description: The name of the IPv6 address.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. For more information about resource groups, see related documentation.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch to which the IPv6 address belongs.
